Name: Simple RTS
About the game: Simple RTS is a Simple Real-Time-Strategy Game Like in the good old days, with 20 types of units The goal is simply to conquer all territories on the map, which is also your AI opponent's goal... The main features: Looks like Dune2, Feels like Z & Tower Defense (very dynamic and stressful) Well balanced units Helpful mini-map Resources gathering Accuracy bonus for units on higher ground Units are leveling up for each kill Some cool examples of special units in the game: Invisible bike to spy enemy territories Tank that can teleport to any location on the map Artillery that bombs any chosen area on the map Rocket launcher that converts the enemy to join your side And more surprises...
Meta Title: Simple RTS: Jun 19, 2017, Gal Hajaj and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Simple RTS? Check out the release date (Jun 19, 2017), developer insights from Gal Hajaj, and a complete game summary.
